title: Integration Sync Failed
description: Fired when an integration data sync fails.

errorMessage.description: A human-readable message describing the sync failure.

errorCode.description: A machine-readable error code for the sync failure.

recordsProcessed.description: The total number of records processed before the failure.

recordsFailed.description: The number of records that failed to sync.

isRetryable.description: Whether the failed sync can be retried.
